name: Millionaire Ver.2
description:
It's a card game, based on a very old tabletop game published in "Class" magazine for young people back in 1994 (when I still was a little kid). 

How to play?

  1. Make a bet
  2. Draw a card
  3. Collect reward

It is my first game made on Unity. It was quite hard and took a lot of time to make such a simple game. However the inspiration kept me going and here it is. If you like the idea and have any suggestions or comments - I would be very glad to hear them out. Thank you.
